comments:
Adding an attribute via the extensions tab for a complex type or element doesn't behave properly.

The attribute is added, but the Extensions tab is not updated graphically to show the newly added attribute.

On a related note, entering text in the text fields on the right hand side of the Extensions tab requires a focus lost (mouse click away) before the value is applied.  The enter key does nothing.
